attributes.action: Look to bring back all of the Customer Services and Call Centre jobs back to the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop these services being moved to; India, Ireland and South Africa.

In doing so we can increase the; quality and reliability of the services, and improve the security of our personal data.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Look to bring back all of the Customer Services and Call Centre jobs back to the United Kingdom."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11270.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/OffshoreCCC/
